title: modules.yaml not working with LMOD as documented?
body:
I am trying to follow the current documentation on `modules.yaml` found [here](https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/module_file_tutorial.html#lua-hierarchical-module-files).  But when I create `~/.spack/modules.yaml` with the `enable::` keyword, I can't regenerate the modulefiles:

```
$ spack module refresh --module-type lmod -y
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/kellyt/temp/spack/bin/spack", line 129, in <module>
    module = spack.cmd.get_module(cmd)
  File "/home/kellyt/temp/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py", line 74, in get_module
    level=0)
  File "/home/kellyt/temp/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/cd.py", line 26, in <module>
    import spack.modules
  File "/home/kellyt/temp/spack/lib/spack/spack/modules.py", line 65, in <module>
    CONFIGURATION = spack.config.get_config('modules')
  File "/home/kellyt/temp/spack/lib/spack/spack/config.py", line 403, in get_config
    data = scope.get_section(section)
  File "/home/kellyt/temp/spack/lib/spack/spack/config.py", line 248, in get_section
    data   = _read_config_file(path, schema)
  File "/home/kellyt/temp/spack/lib/spack/spack/config.py", line 326, in _read_config_file
    validate_section(data, schema)
  File "/home/kellyt/temp/spack/lib/spack/spack/config.py", line 220, in validate_section
    raise ConfigFormatError(e, data)
spack.config.ConfigFormatError: /home/kellyt/.spack/modules.yaml:11: Additional properties are not allowed ('enable:' was unexpected)
```

Ref: [modules.yaml.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/586223/modules.yaml.txt)

What am I doing wrong?
